price: 12.Cidina ma beeniso aan aheyn xadgudbe kastoo denbiile ah.
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
